row.process: ! -------------------------------------------- ! Parameter fÃ¼r JOBI.GETPW_DBTOOLS definieren: ! -------------------------------------------- :SET &ORADB# = "DLLW1&IDT#" :SET &ORAUSER# = "SPIEGELAPP" :SET &PARAFILE# = "&BATCH#_&ORADB#.PAR" :SET &DUMPFILE# = "&BATCH#_&ORADB#.DMP" :SET &EXPSCRIPT# = "&BATCH#_&ORADB#" ! ---------------------------------- :SET &LOGFILE# = "&LOGDIR#/&EXPSCRIPT#.log" ! ------------------------ ! Alten Dumpfile loeschen: ! ------------------------ :INC JOBI.DBTOOLS_CREATEFOLDER !:INC JOBI.DBTOOLS_DELETEFILE "EDIZIONE" = "&EXP_PATH#/dmp/&DUMPFILE#" :INC JOBI.GETPW_DBTOOLS ! ----------------------------- ! Parameterdatei zusammenbauen: ! ----------------------------- cat << __EOF__ > &PARAFILE# SCHEMAS=BBS DUMPFILE=&DUMPFILE# REUSE_DUMPFILES=YES DIRECTORY=&DIRECTORY# FLASHBACK_TIME="TO_TIMESTAMP('&TS#', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')" LOGFILE=&DIRECTORY#_LOG:&EXPSCRIPT#_&TIMESTAMP_AM#.log CONTENT=DATA_ONLY EXCLUDE=TABLE:"IN ( 'TBBAUSLOES' ,'TBBBUCH_VERD_ST1' ,'TBBBUCH_VERD_ST2' ,'TBBBUCH_VERD_ST3' ,'TBBVTR_T_STAND' ,'TBBVTR_T_STAT_BEW' ,'TBBVTR_T_PROV_BEW' ,'TBBFAKTURA' )" EXCLUDE=TABLE:"LIKE ('TBI%')" __EOF__ :INC JOBI.DBTOOLS_RUNEXPORT
